#summary Release Notes for TextBE

= Release Notes =

v0.1.1 
  * Updated bt transformation to graphviz to remove FIXEDSIZE="TRUE" bug that was effecting linux and osx installs
  * No longer requires xercesImpl.jar hack
  * Added initial support for Structure tree editing and visualisation
  * Fixed issues with curly braces (issue 4) and atomic composition of leaf nodes (issue 7)

v0.1 Initial Release
